metadata.title: CVE-2023-46862 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.5.9. During a racewith SQ thread exit, an io_uring/fdinfo.c io_uring_show_fdinfo NULL pointerdereference can occur.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46862` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-1027-oem - 6.1.0-1027.27
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
linux-hwe-6.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.5, was needed').
